text: is a Japanese actress and model. Her films included Our Little Sister, Gakkō no Kaidan and Chihayafuru. She starred in Natsuzora, the 100th NHK asadora. She was named as a Newcomer of the Year at the 39th Japan Academy Film Prize ceremony, the 37th Yokohama Film Festival and the 41st Elan d'or Awards. She won the Best Supporting Actress award at the 41st Japan Academy Film Prize. ==Personal life== Her sister, Alice, is an actress and model.http://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2015-08-20/chihayafuru-suzu- hirose-considered-most-disliked-female-celebrity/.91915 On October 6, 2020, it was announced Hirose has tested positive for COVID-19 but is asymptomatic.https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-10-06/actress-suzu- hirose-tests-positive-for-covid-19-but-is-asymptomatic/.164931 ==Career== Kaho, Masami Nagasawa, Hirose and Haruka Ayase at the 2015 Cannes Festival. Hirose won the Japan Academy Prize for "Newcomer of the Year" and the "Best New Actress" award at Kinema Junpo. She and Hirokazu Kore-eda worked on films, Our Little Sister and The Third Murder. Hirose played Chihaya Ayase in the competitive karuta film adaptation Chihayafuru, based on Yuki Suetsugu's manga series. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Year ! Title !
